first she was in a group of women gamers who wanted to make a game by giving out ideas to certain artist who would develop it, and then give said women royalties, once she got that concept art zoe backstabbed said group and told everyone they wanted spec work, and ran with the game, so she could get full royalties.

she slept with five guys who were "casually" gaming journalist for big websites for promotion,while cheating on his husband and manipulating him then blamed wizardchan, a plaace full of depressed people, and framed /v/ by doxxing herself to redirect the attention, causing SJW to attact suicidal people.

when people found out everyone divided, some places want quinn and the journalist heads while the other side want her to be named king of feminist because why not.
